TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DynamicRouteExpression extends System.Web.UI.WebControls.Expressions.DataSourceExpression

summary.span: 從路由資訊取得主索引鍵，以執行資料篩選。

span.span: Gets the primary key from the routing information in order to perform data filtering.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別會搭配在網頁標記中的控制項。The class is used with the control in page markup. 類別包含在 Web 要求的路由資訊取得主索引鍵。The class gets the primary key from the routing information that is contained in a Web request. 控制項便會使用中的索引鍵`Where`子句。The control then uses the key in a `Where` clause. 這樣會修改資料來源，然後傳回篩選的索引鍵的資料表資料列的查詢。This modifies the query for the data source, which then returns table rows filtered by the key. 您也可以藉由使用指定的外部索引鍵來篩選資料屬性。You can also filter data by using a foreign key that you specify using the property. ## 宣告式語法Declarative Syntax ``` ``` ## Examples 原始程式碼的 Visual Studio 專案是使用本主題隨附： [Scaffolding 動態資料](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=168914)。A Visual Studio project with source code is available to accompany this topic: [Scaffolding Dynamic Data](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=168914). 下列範例會示範自訂 List.aspx 頁面範本針對 Products 資料表。The following example shows a custom List.aspx page template for the Products table. 它會使用屬性來指定篩選產品資料列的 ProductCategory 外部索引鍵。It uses the property to specify the ProductCategory foreign key for filtering the Products rows. 自訂的 List.aspx 頁面會顯示包含連結的 ProductCategory 外部索引鍵資料行所包含的類別目錄的資料行。The custom List.aspx page displays a column that contains links of the categories that are contained by the ProductCategory foreign-key column. 當使用者按一下其中一個連結時，List.aspx 頁面會顯示包含所選類別目錄的資料列。When the user clicks one of these links, the List.aspx page displays only the rows that contain the selected category. 這個範例需要下列各項：The example requires the following: - Dynamic Data 網站。A Dynamic Data Web site. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[逐步解說： 建立新動態資料網站上使用 Scaffolding](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/1564aef2-9103-436a-9806-c8ad7abd616a)。For more information, see [Walkthrough: Creating a New Dynamic Data Web Site Using Scaffolding](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/1564aef2-9103-436a-9806-c8ad7abd616a). - 有提供 AdventureWorksLT 範例資料庫中。The AdventureWorksLT sample database. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[How to： 使用與 AdventureWorksLT 資料庫的連接。MDF 檔案](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d34ffbac-607d-40f1-b088-0a3304ea032b)。For more information, see [How to: Connect to the AdventureWorksLT Database using an .MDF File](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d34ffbac-607d-40f1-b088-0a3304ea032b). [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicRouteExpression#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/system.web.dynamicdata.dynamicrouteexpression/cs/list.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicRouteExpression#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/system.web.dynamicdata.dynamicrouteexpression/vb/list.aspx#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicRouteExpression#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/system.web.dynamicdata.dynamicrouteexpression/cs/list.aspx.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicRouteExpression#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/system.web.dynamicdata.dynamicrouteexpression/vb/list.aspx.vb#3)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您通常不會呼叫建構函式。You typically do not call the constructor. 相反地，您使用在網頁標記中的類別和類別初始化時載入的頁面。Instead, you use the class in page markup and the class is initialized when the page is loaded.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ ColumnName { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.ColumnName : string with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定資料行的名稱，這個資料行包含用來查詢資料來源的外部索引鍵。

span.span: Gets or sets the name of a column that contains a foreign key that is used to query the data source.

value.span: 外部索引鍵資料行的名稱。

span.span: The name of the foreign-key column.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性表示外部索引鍵。The property represents a foreign key. 這個金鑰用來修改資料來源的查詢。This key is used to modify the query for the data source. ## Examples 下列範例會示範如何指定 ProductCategory 外部索引鍵資料行，篩選要顯示的產品。The following example shows how to specify the ProductCategory foreign-key column for filtering the products to display. 這個範例是供較大範例的一部分類別。This example is part of the larger example that is provided for the class. ``` ```

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance class System.Linq.IQueryable GetQueryable(class System.Linq.IQueryable source) cil managed
Public Overrides Function GetQueryable (source As IQueryable) As IQueryable

summary.span: 取得資料來源中的查詢。

span.span: Gets the query from the data source..

returns.span: 已修改之查詢的執行個體。

span.span: An instance of the modified query.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 從資料來源，由查詢`source`參數，會修改套用目前的路由資訊的主要或外部索引鍵。The query from the data source, represented by the `source` parameter, is modified by applying the primary or foreign key that is the current route information.

MemberSignature.Value: public override void SetContext (System.Web.UI.Control owner, System.Web.HttpContext context, System.Web.UI.WebControls.IQueryableDataSource dataSource);

param.name: owner

span.span: The control that contains the instance.

param.name: dataSource
param.span: 執行個體的目標資料來源。

span.span: The target data source for the instance.

summary.span: 設定 物件的 HTTP 內容。

span.span: Sets the HTTP context of the object.
